summary: Focus app - A productivity/content filtering application intended to block adult content and limit app usage time. Note: Full implementation requires native mobile OS capabilities beyond web app scope.
architectural_notes: Content filtering and app usage restrictions require native mobile OS capabilities not available in web apps
known_issues: Device-level content filtering cannot be implemented in web applications - requires native iOS/Android development

new_feature_requests.summary: Set time limits on apps (12-hour lockout feature)
